A virtual assistant service for small business owners who need help managing their day-to-day tasks. The assistant would be available 24/7 via text, email, or phone and could handle tasks such as scheduling appointments, sending emails, and managing social media accounts.

A subscription-based cleaning service that uses eco-friendly products and methods to clean homes and offices. The service would be customizable to the needs of each customer and would include regular check-ins to ensure customer satisfaction.

A meal delivery service that sources ingredients from local farmers and uses sustainable packaging materials. The service would offer a variety of meal options to choose from and could be customized to meet dietary restrictions.

A virtual tutoring service that connects students with experienced tutors for online learning. The service would offer a variety of subjects to choose from and would include regular check-ins to ensure student progress.

A mobile car detailing service that uses eco-friendly products and methods to clean andate cars. The service would be customizable to the needs of each customer and would include regular check-ins to ensure customer satisfaction.
